title: Help me understand
academic integrity policies
content: Can you explain the university's academic integrity policy regarding plagiarism and its consequences? I want to make sure I properly cite all my sources in my research paper.

title: Explain the process
for requesting academic accommodations
content: What is the university's policy and procedure for requesting academic accommodations due to a disability? What documentation is required and which office should I contact?

title: Summarize
the student code of conduct
content: Could you provide a summary of the key points in our university's student code of conduct, particularly regarding on-campus behavior and disciplinary procedures?

title: Walk me through
the grade appeal process
content: I'm considering appealing a grade I received. Can you explain the university's policy on grade appeals, including deadlines, required documentation, and the steps in the process?

title: Clarify the policy
on research ethics and compliance
content: What are the university's policies regarding research involving human subjects? Please explain the IRB approval process and requirements for ethical research compliance.

title: Help me navigate
financial aid and scholarship policies
content: Can you explain the university's policies on maintaining scholarship eligibility, including GPA requirements, course load minimums, and renewal procedures?
